page.title: 11TRADE.
page.content: There are only two shops in the whole of Harlestone,Church Brampton and Althorp.These are all in upper Harlestone.One is a butcher's shop.This is no more than a counter since both butcher and his meat come daily from Northampton.The other is a Post Office/ General Store/Antique Shop.This is a listed building.Customers live either in or close to the village;their main shopping being done in Northampton.The shop does have a delivery service. The Fox and Hounds(Harlestone)serves customers,mainly from outside the village,with drinks and bar snacks. Rural craft industries have rented properties on the Spencer estate.There is a blacksmith in Harlestone. A beekeeper in Harlestone runs a beekeeper supply service.
